thread.title: Nicole

author: Nicole
title: Nicole
text: With a fabulous guide to answer our questions, explain local history and customs and generally smooth the way, we got a great taste of Vietnam. The tour provided much more than we could possibly have organised on our own in such a short time. The only improvements I would suggest would be to pre-book food for the overnight train and increase the time on Halong Bay by using a seaplane for one of the transfers to or from Hanoi - definitely a five star trip with those changes. As it was 4.5. And the mororcycle tour was great fun!
